description: This course delves into a variety of topics beyond the basics. You will learn how to use a wide range of financial, logical, text, and statistical functions; analyze data with the scenario manager; apply conditional formatting; and use the new Sparkline feature. Database management, PivotTables, PivotCharts and Slicers are covered in detail, as well as importing and exporting Excel data between applications.
title: Excel 2010 Advanced
